      • addShiftNewUser

        public model.Shift addShiftNewUser(int idNumber,
                                   java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String lastName,
                                   int phoneNumber,
                                   java.lang.String address,
                                   model.User.TypeDocument typeDocument,
                                   model.Shift.TypeShift typeShift)
                            throws exception.IncompleteInformationException,
                                   exception.NotFoundException,
                                   exception.UserAlreadyExistsException
        Create a shift for a new user (not register user)
        Parameters:
        idNumber - id number of the new user
        name - name of the new user
        lastName - last name of the new user
        phoneNumber - phone number of the new user
        address - address of the new user
        typeDocument - type document of the new user
        typeShift - shift type
        Returns:
        Shift, an object Shift that is the new turn created
        Throws:
        exception.IncompleteInformationException - when information is incomplete
        exception.NotFoundException - when method can't found user
        exception.UserAlreadyExistsException - when user already exist in system
